title: Showering Icon
description: A simple black and white icon depicting a person showering. The figure is shown with curly hair, standing under a showerhead with water droplets falling down. The background includes a bathtub or shower enclosure.

title: Toilet Illustration
description: A simple line drawing of a toilet, showing the bowl and tank. The tank is partially filled with light blue water.

title: Shower vs. Bathtub
description: The image shows a simple line drawing of a shower on the left and a bathtub with a red 'X' over it on the right, indicating that using a bathtub is not allowed or recommended.

title: Directional Signage on Grass
description: The image features a bright blue sky with wispy clouds above a lush green field. In the foreground, there are seven directional arrows labeled A through G, with the arrow labeled A highlighted in green. The arrows are arranged vertically, suggesting a ranking or categorization.

title: Stick Figure Eating
description: A simple black and white illustration of a stick figure standing next to a bowl, using a spoon to eat.
